titlestmt.titleproper: Independence Seaport Museum Becuna veterans collection 1943-2003 2000-2003
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012

did.unittitle: Independence Seaport Museum Becuna veterans collection

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of materials assembled by Douglas Buchanan, Ships Program Coordinator for ISM for the 25th anniversary [of what? possibly the restoration?] and 2000 reunion of Becuna veterans. Materials include: correspondence (letters and email), photographs, color photocopies of photographs, videos, reminiscences, index to oral histories (oral history tapes are not included), snapshots from the 2000 reunion, order of events for the 2000 reunion, brief biographies of Becuna veterans print-outs from Sandy MacNaught's Becuna history website (g-macnaught.com) CDs of drawings of the Becuna, and photos and reminiscences a small number of items of ephemera from 1943-1945, including menus, invitations, programs, ration cards, and photographs (recent reproductions) donated by William Ambrose (a Becuna vet) volunteer forms, gift and release forms for oral histories, interview data forms notebook of contact information for veterans correspondence from veterans to Buchanan about reunion attendance restoration done in 1976 secondary resource materials on US Navy submarines, a xerox of a Guppy class submarine manual, a history of torpedo technology, a fleet sub manual (on CD), 1961-1964 issues of Dolphin, the US Naval Submarine Base, New London, CT newsletter

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

otherfindaid.p: An inventory is available in the repository.

relatedmaterial.p: Related material may be found in the following collections: Independence Seaport Museum: Becuna collection
